title: Energy Crystal
cleaned_text: Energy Crystal From Industrial-Craft-Wiki | | These neat little pieces of future technology are the commonly used energy storage device for all REALLY [advanced Machines](/index.php?title=Advanced_Machine). Yes, they can even get more advanced than the [Macerator](/index.php?title=Macerator)! However, newly created Energy Crystals do not contain energy at all. None. Zero. Being so super-awesome and advanced, before use, they must first be charged in either an with at by compressing [Energium Dust](/index.php?title=Energium_Dust). Notes[ [edit](/index.php?title=Energy_Crystal&action=edit§ion=4)] Like [RE Batteries](/index.php?title=RE_Battery), Energy Crystals can stack up to sixteen items a time so long as all the crystals have the exact same charge. Also like RE Batteries, right-clicking will recharge the electric tools and armor on your hotbar. Multiblock Components Cooling Heat
